All Classes

Class Description
ApplePickup
ApplePickup class exists inside the game, and when collided with by a SnakeEntity, applies an effect to it, such as increasing it's length
Button
The Button Component allows the user to interact with a visual element via mouse movement and clicks
Button.HORIZONTAL_TEXT_ALIGN
The available horizontal alignment modes
Button.STATE
The available button states
Button.VERTICAL_TEXT_ALIGN
The available vertical alignment modes
CollisionController
CollisionController is responsible for checking for collisions between entities running inside the game.
CollisionElement  
ColouredComponent
A coloured version of the Component class, providing storage, setting and getting of the colour used for this component
Component
The core component class, used to abstract common information from UI elements, such as position and size.
Controller  
DeathFragment
The DeathFragment is displayed when the game has ended.
Effect
The Effect class is responsible for animating effects inside the game window
EffectController
EffectController facilitates the spawning and animation of effects in the game
EffectFrame  
EngineComponent  
Entity  
EntityController
The EntityController class handles the adding, removal, updating and drawing of onscreen elements, such as SnakeEntity and ApplePickup.
Fragment
Abstracted functionality for game fragments is kept here
GameEngine  
GameFragment
This fragment is used to display the current score of the players
InvalidParameterException  
Label
The Label class is used to display a single line of text on the game screen
MenuFragment
This fragment is used to display the main menu
Panel
The Panel class is used to display a solid, rectangular block of colour; or, the outline of said block.
PauseFragment
This fragment is used to display a pause overlay when the user hits the 'ESCAPE' key.
Pickup
The Pickup class handles some of the backend core functionality of on-screen Pickups
Player
The Player class is used to keep track of the player stats
RandomPoint
The RandomPoint is used to find a set of co-ordinates that is not colliding with any other entities or the game boundary.
SnakeEntity
The SnakeEntity class is responsible for moving and handling precise collision checks for the in-game snakes
SnakeEntity.DIRECTION
An enum containing the possible directions of the snake movement
SnakeEntity.SnakePart
An inner class used to encapsulate the information of each part of the snake
SnakeEntity.SnakeTurn
An inner class used to encapsulate a turn which needs to be made by the snake
SnakeGame
Base class for this snake game; instantiates all core controllers, game engine, entity sprites and runs the main render loop.
SnakeGame.STATE
The possible game states
Text
A simple class that allows the encapsulation of text information for easier transport of this information inside of classes.
TextFadeEffect
This Effect class is used to show a piece of text, and have it slowly fade out and rise out of position
TextFadeEffect.Frame
This nested class serves to abstract away the information pertaining to each frame of the Effect
UIController
The UIController is responsible for managing and drawing Fragments on screen
UIMouseReactive
